review: Until now there are some apps I often use that appear unavailable on the stick, like YouTube. And there are others feature apps unavailable also (ESPN for example). It also lacks a good DNLA app to play my collection of movies.So far I've been able to play only movies from Netflix, those from amazon prime always show a "license error".

review: i'm having a problem with streaming/buffering taking too long. other than that it was simple to set up and once I get this problem taken care of I plan to order a coule more

review: Bought Fire TV Stick as an alternative to Apple TV in the guest room. We have Amazon Prime so it is great that we get Netflix and Prime video in one device. Can't beat it for the value...... but if you have all your music on iTune then it is not ideal.
